name: Yang Liu 0005
content: Yang Liu's Homepage at Tsinghua University English | Chinese Yang Liu GDS Professor Department of Computer Science and Technology Institute for AI Industry Research Tsinghua University Bio Yang Liu is the GDS Professor in the Department of Computer Science and Technology at Tsinghua University. He is Executive Dean of Institute for AI Industry Research (AIR) and Executive Director of AI Agent Hospital. His research interests include natural language processing, Medical AI and AI for Science. He received COLING/ACL 2006 Meritorious Asian NLP Paper Award, ACL 2017 Outstanding Paper Award, ACL 2023 Outstanding Paper Award, and ICLR 2023 Outstanding Paper Award Honorable Mention. He served as Executive Committee Member of Asia-Pacific Chapter of ACL, Editorial Board Member of Computational Linguistics, and Associate Editor of ACM TALLIP. Research Foundation Models for Artificial Intelligence Directions: multilinguality, multimodality, trustworthy generation, alignment, etc. Recent publications: Xuanyu Lei, Zonghan Yang, Xinrui Chen, Peng Li, and Yang Liu. 2025.
